attributes.action: Legalise cannabis for personal use for adult over the age of 18 years old
attributes.additional_details: By legalising cannabis and regulating it would take the big profits away from the organise criminal gangs that control the drug market
attributes.background: Realise that we are the biggest Exporters of medical cannabis and having legal cannabis here would be Financially Beneficiary to our country And infrastructure

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/655029
